episodes.title: Contagious Q+A show
episodes.summary: Listen to Scott and the Evil Queen answer junkie questions about Contagious and various other projects of the FDO.

episodes.title: Episode 26
episodes.summary: Here it is Junkies: the final episode. What happens to Perry? To Dew? To Cheslea and her Mommy? How about General Ogden? Margaret and Clarence? And how about the great city of Detroit?

episodes.title: Episode 25
episodes.summary: The Motor City is once again the murder capitol of the world as bullets fly, rockets fire, and corpses stack up like cordwood. General Ogden's men are fighting tooth and nail, extracting a harsh price for every inch of ground lost. Perry attempts to close in on Chelsea, but only minutes remain before her Angels begin pouring through the gate!

episodes.title: Episode 24
episodes.summary: Planes explode, cities burn, guns fire and blood flies. Chelsea Jewell will not be denied, she is hell bent on opening the gate and allowing the Angels to come through. But, can she stop The Boogeyman, aka Scary Perry Dawsey?

episodes.title: Episode 23
episodes.summary: The most bizarre interrogation you've ever seen, "the five-second rule," and Dew lays down the law with Margaret. The stage is set for Motor City carnage the likes of which hasn't been seen since the Pistons won back-to-back NBA titles. This episode is for you, Chuck Daley.

episodes.title: Episode 22
episodes.summary: The long, brutal, final day of Contagious has begun. It should all be over, right? So why is Perry Dawsey hearing the voices again? And what are the voices telling him to do? Get ready for a shocker.

episodes.title: Episode 21
episodes.summary: A major character moves on to that gridiron in the sky. Margaret Montoya takes charge in Detroit, Dustin Climer spreads the Word of Chelsea and Perry gets his gun. That *can't* be good, can it?

episodes.title: Episode 20
episodes.summary: What do two all-beef patties, legos, ice cream on a stick, and cops all have in common? The are all part of cute little Chelsea's plans for a brighter tomorrow!

episodes.title: Episode 19
episodes.summary: Chelsea talks to her Daddy about meeting Jesus, and to her Mommy about the things that need to be done. After addressing her family issues, she sets her sights on getting even with "The Boogeyman." Meanwhile, Dew tries to get Perry to face his fears head-on, and the Orbital realizes that its days of anonymity are finished.

episodes.title: Episode 18
episodes.summary: Margaret Montoya unleashes her frustration on Dew Phillips and Clarence Otto, General Charlie Ogden gets his priorities straight, and the city of Detroit welcomes a new visitor.

episodes.title: Episode 17
episodes.summary: Chelsea reached out to Perry, which stoked the violence at his core. Dustin Climer gets religion, while the Murray vs. Vanessa tension simmers towards a boiling point.

episodes.title: Episode 16
episodes.summary: Our Jerry Springer critic is in seriously bad shape. The hunt is on for Clan Jewell, another power shift shakes up the playing field, and the infected begin flocking to sweet lil' Chelsea.

episodes.title: Episode 15
episodes.summary: Margaret tries to cope with her loss and deal with Betty Jewell's autopsy. Pyromania strikes again, Chelsea searches for someplace with "lots of people," and the evacuation of Gaylord begins.

episodes.title: Episode 13
episodes.summary: The invasion of Gaylord begins! Chelsea's abilities continue to grow, much to the chagrin of her mother and father. Margaret tries to cope with the Amos situation, and Mister Burkle the postman gets a special delivery ;)

episodes.title: Episode 12
episodes.summary: The story spotlight focuses on Betty Jewell's strange infection, as Margaret and Amos operate to save her life. Cheffie's remains meet the efficiency that is the United States Postal Service, and Chelsea's "smoochies" take on a new and sinister meaning.

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.summary: Dew exercises questionable judgement when he teaches Perry how to shoot. Betty Jewell is following in the footsteps of her father. The Orbital tries to find a way to stop the Sonofabitch as Chelsea's destiny begins to solidify.

episodes.title: Episode 14
episodes.summary: Dew, Perry, Baum and Jens sit down for a friendly meal as they wait for the green light to chase down the Jewell family. Chelsea isn't going to sit and wait for the man to bring her down! But wait, maybe Chelsea won't be the only one in charge anymore.......

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.summary: Cheffie's demise is not pretty. Chelsea talks to her new "imaginary friend." Dew and Margaret finally convince Perry to talk about his ordeal with the triangles. Their hope is that he will shed some light on the origin of the infection.

episodes.title: Episode 09
episodes.summary: Colonel Charlie Ogden deals with the casualties incurred under his campaign against the Hatchlings. Margaret calls an old friend. More people in Gaylord succumb to the seeds while Dew and Perry have a long, drunken conversation.

episodes.title: Episode 08
episodes.summary: The crawlers begin their alteration of the Jewels. Betty and Unkie Donny head home. Will they make it safely? Dew and Perry work things out after their brawl. Perry tries to explain how the voices have changed.

episodes.title: Episode 07
episodes.summary: Perry and Dew finally have it out. Who's going to be the alpha dog? Margaret patches up the defeated man. We get a quick peek at how the Jewel's uninvited guests are affecting them.

episodes.title: Episode 06
episodes.summary: Margo brings Dew room service. Wonder what will happen there? We get to know Chelsea, Betty, and Uncle Donny a bit better. The orbital issues orders to the hidden hatchlings and launches probe 17. The Jewel family receives some unexpected guests.

episodes.title: Episode 05
episodes.summary: Meet the Jewels! What role will this average American family play in our story as events progress? Murray gives Dew a verbal enema. Bob's Breakfast Shack hosts a top secret briefing in the back room. Perry gives Dew a memorable answer when Dew invites him to join the crew for breakfast.

episodes.title: Episode 04
episodes.summary: Colonel Ogden has put President Gutierez squarely onto the hot seat. Will he stick to the values he ran on or utilize Murray Longworth's specialized talents? Vanessa is disgusted when she learns what Option #4 is. Margaret confirms a major breakthrough in the autopsy room. The master plan of the invasion is revealed!

episodes.title: Episode 03
episodes.summary: Dew discovers Perry at Tad's house; he's not pleased. The $20 bets begin. Margo confronts a somewhat impaired Perry about how he's been "helping out." Colonel Ogden shares his theory about the triangle's feint with Dew. He then exercises the full extent of his authority to target a new construct.

episodes.title: Episode 02
episodes.summary: President Gutierez decides what his protocols regarding the contagion are going to be. Perry Dawsey demonstrates his view of child abusers. Margaret Montoya gets some new toys. The Exterminators try to capture a hatchling alive. What could go wrong?

episodes.title: Episode 01
episodes.summary: Murray Stapleton, the Deputy Director of CIA, briefs the new president on the current situation. The new commander in chief is *not* pleased with the mess his predecessor has left him with. Perry Dawsey and Dew Phillips are working in the field, but not necessarily together.....
